01.speaker: Ọbàtálá
01.text: Ọmọtẹmi, o ti dé. Mo ti ń dúró de rẹ. Se o setan fún ìrìn àjò rẹ?
01.translation: Ọmọtẹmi, you have arrived. I have been expecting you. Are you ready for your journey?
01.scene_description: A mystical grove bathed in soft white light. Ọbàtálá, robed in flowing white garments, stands before a sacred tree.

options.text: Mo ni ibẹru, sugbon mo fẹ mọ idi rẹ.
options.translation: I am afraid, but I want to understand why.

01.life_spirit_hint: Courage is important, but so is curiosity. Choose wisely.

02.speaker: Ọbàtálá
02.text: Dára, ìrìn àjò yìí ń gbà agbára àti ìmò. Ṣé o l’ọkàn balẹ?
02.translation: Good, this journey requires strength and wisdom. Do you have a calm heart?
02.scene_description: Ọbàtálá steps closer, his presence filling the grove with a calming aura.

options.text: Mo ni igbagbo ninu ara mi.
Mo ní àníyàn, ṣùgbọ́n mo fẹ gbìyànjú.
options.translation: I have doubts, but I want to try.

02.life_spirit_hint: Confidence is powerful, but admitting doubt can also be a strength.

03.speaker: Ọbàtálá
03.text: Ìbẹ̀rù rẹ ló dára, sugbon gbó: Ọ̀nà yìí kún fún àbẹ̀wò àti ìmò. Ṣé o ṣetan?
03.translation: Your fear is natural, but listen: This path is full of revelations and wisdom. Are you ready?
03.scene_description: Ọbàtálá’s eyes glow softly as a breeze rustles through the sacred grove.

options.text: Mo fẹ mọ siwaju sii ṣaaju ki n to pinnu.
options.translation: I want to know more before I decide.

03.life_spirit_hint: Seeking knowledge is wise, but hesitation can be costly.

04.speaker: Ọbàtálá
04.text: Igbagbo rẹ ni yóò fi ọ siwaju. Bayi, lọ si Ọba Adéwálé, ki o fi ifiranṣẹ mi ranṣẹ.
04.translation: Your faith will guide you. Now, go to King Adéwálé and deliver my message.
04.scene_description: Ọbàtálá raises his hand, and a soft glow surrounds you as you prepare to leave.

05.speaker: Ọbàtálá
05.text: Ìpinnu rẹ ṣe pataki. Ṣé o le gbẹkẹle ara rẹ?
05.translation: Your decision is important. Can you trust yourself?
05.scene_description: Ọbàtálá watches you closely, waiting for your answer.

options.text: Mo ní àníyàn, ṣùgbọ́n mo fẹ kọ ẹkọ diẹ sii.
options.translation: I have doubts, but I want to learn more.

05.life_spirit_hint: Trust is essential, but growth comes from learning.

06.speaker: Ọbàtálá
06.text: Ìmò je ohun pataki. Sugbon ma jìya fun ìdẹwò.
06.translation: Knowledge is important, but do not suffer from hesitation.
06.scene_description: A gentle wind sweeps through the grove, carrying whispers of wisdom.
06.life_spirit_hint: Delaying too long may cost you valuable time.
